title: Just finished the Alexandar fight in DOS2 classic tactician (blind)
body:
I didn't look up any guides and aside from watching a casual play through up until they escaped fort joy.

I swear that fight was insane. For those who have played, how did you handle that fight? I cheesed the living hell out of it by blocking the path up routing them around the long way and the gheist just got blocked out and then I TPed him onto the worm when he spawned. It just took a long time to realize the worm ai just optimizes the most total damage/easiest lethal. It was fun but really hard. My whole party was level 7.
